name: Machine Learning Engineer (Researcher)
description:
About Visagio

Visagio has delivered over 1,000 projects worldwide in areas such as supply chain, program/project management, operational strategy and excellence, process engineering and more. Visagio has a team of 350+ consultants spread in four continents with five hubs located in London, Moscow, Perth, Sao Paulo, and Rio de Janeiro. We cover all industries with a particular focus on Oil and Gas, Mining, and Agriculture in Russia. We pride ourselves on our people and culture and have been listed in 'Best Place to Work' for four consecutive years.


About the Role
Visagio is looking for Machine Learning Engineer to test hypotheses and help to build a model to recognize specific entities within a text string (record). This model will be a part of an IT solution for catalogue data cleansing and normalization. Essentially, we need to answer a question - what are the attributes that compose the description of a catalogue record.


Qualification
- Average grade above 4.5 out of 5.0 in B.Sc. Bachelor, Master, or Ph.D. in Mathematics, Statistics, Machine Learning, Physics, or Computer Science


Skills required

- 1+ years experience with advanced Machine Learning methods in text recognition

- Strong knowledge of probability, statistics, algorithms, optimization, numerical methods

Leadership capabilities

demonstrates courage, deals with ambiguity, demonstrates a strong sense of accountability and delivery, likes and is good with people, has an entrepreneurial mindset, and is willing to go beyond the last mile.
